alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 8:25PM CDT until March 29 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Cheney, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Colwich, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Andale, Eastborough, Bentley and Viola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 21. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
